# Getting started

```{r}
packages = c('scales', 'viridis', 
             'lubridate', 'ggthemes', 
             'gridExtra', 'tidyverse', 
             'readxl', 'knitr',
             'data.table', 'ViSiElse')
for (p in packages){
  if(!require(p, character.only = T)){
    install.packages(p)
  }
  library(p,character.only = T)
}
```

```{r}
logs <- read_rds("data/participant_logs.rds")
logs_1 <-  logs %>% 
  filter(participantId == 113)
logs_2 <-  logs %>% 
  filter(participantId == 758)
logs_1
```
